title: Game won't open after champ select
body: The league of legends logo pops up and the game is in the background but everything is a black screen, furthermore, task manager recognizes it as a not responding program. This only happened after I patched my game. BTW I am using windows 10, I've tried running in administrator mode, repairing the game and running in compatibility mode already - none of which work, if anyone could provide assistance that would be great.
